definition: lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
The Name of the Rose, 1986 movie based on the novel by Umberto Eco

sentences.english: It springs up from a fountain in the courtyard of a bewitched castle;
sentences.chinese: 救命水呀，是從一個魔宮院內的泉眼裏冒出來的。

sentences.english: And when he got there everything was just as the dwarf had said.
sentences.chinese: 他一到魔宮，真都像小人兒說的那樣。

sentences.english: Complete all Story Mode Levels in Temple of Doom Hub.
sentences.chinese: 完成魔宮場景的全部故事模式關卡。

sentences.english: Books , indeed , endow us with a whole enchanted palace of thoughts .
sentences.chinese: 事實上，書籍賦予我們一個思想魔宮。

sentences.english: Liu Zhongyong pressure fox Jane ding will day after plugging in the palace, also came to help.
sentences.chinese: 劉忠用壓狐鼎將天貞堵在魔宮後，也來幫忙。
